activities: Siemens Prod. Lifecycle Mgmt Software Inc has contracted with TENTECH, LLC to provide the Siemens Corporate I.D. Smartcards to the employees of their various location. Some of the locations are located in European countries. We will receive employee names, pictures, Siemens e-mail addresses, and GID numbers for each card request. All such information will always remain in the Siemens IT system.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TENTECH, LLC will cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
